full_summary:
## International Trade Agreement Notice

### Solicitation Number
* 01B68-23-0032

### Title
NPP TSPS RFP Evaluation Services Agricultural Climate Solutions

### Summary
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites proposals for the Evaluation Services Agricultural Climate Solutions program. The objective of this evaluation is to provide feedback to senior management on the relevance, effectiveness, and design and delivery of the Agricultural Climate Solutions program. This evaluation will take a summative approach for the initial Living Labs Initiative (2018-2023) and a formative approach for the Agriculture Climate Solutions program (ACS-LL and ACS-OFCAF) still in the early stages of Program implementation.

### Key Dates
* Publication Date: 2023-07-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-11T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2023-03-31

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

### Contracting Information
The contracting entity is Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada. The contact information for this procurement is as follows:

* Kyle Harrington
* Email: kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: 5555555

### Notice and Attachments
The notice and attachments for this procurement can be found at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7534/23-0032-npp---eng.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7534/23-0032-npp-fr.pdf (French) [end of entry].
